remarks: The set of lattice lines in a Hilbert lattice.  (Contributed by NM, 16-Jun-2012.)
statement:
llnset.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
llnset.c $e |- C = ( <o ` K ) $.
llnset.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
llnset.n $e |- N = ( LLines ` K ) $.
llnset $p |- ( K e. D -> N = { x e. B | E. p e. A p C x } ) $.
$d A p $.
$d B x $.
$d K p x $.
